format.name: JsonFormatChecker
format.description: The argument value must be a valid JSON object. The JSON must be syntactically correct and parseable.

fn_schema.name: fn59__1__lawyer_finder
fn_schema.description: Locate lawyers near you based on their specialization.

location.description: Your location. The argument value must be a valid JSON object. The JSON must be syntactically correct and parseable.

items.description: Specializations of lawyer that you are looking for.

experience.description: Experience in years that lawyer has. Default 1

user_queries: I'm planning to start a new business venture in Los Angeles, California, and I really want to ensure that all my legal documents are handled by someone with a keen insight into business law. It's critical for me to find a lawyer who specializes in business law or corporate law. I would appreciate it if you could help me identify a few options nearby. The legal aspects of setting up a company can be quite complex, and while I'm not too concerned about how much experience they have, I do think a general familiarity with small business laws is vital.

As someone who's just moved to New York City, I'm really trying to get everything in place for my young family. One of my immediate needs is finding a lawyer who specializes in family law or child custody issues. I need someone who is ideally nearby and who has at least a few years of experience, though I'm flexible on the exact number of years. The city is large, and I'm feeling a bit overwhelmed trying to get settled, so having some professional legal assistance will be absolutely invaluable to me and my family.

Living in Miami, Florida has been fantastic so far, but I've come across a few legal issues relating to real estate that I need help with. I would really like to find a lawyer who is well-versed in property law or real estate law. It's important for me that they're located within the city so we can discuss any paperwork or negotiations easily. While I don't necessarily require someone with decades of experience, having a lawyer who has handled several cases of similar nature would definitely put my mind at ease.

Recently, in Chicago, Illinois, I've started to look into making some personal plans about my estate and future financial planning. I've been told it's wise to have a lawyer guide me through this, particularly someone who is skilled in either estate planning law or elder law. It's crucial they are operating in my area as I may need multiple consultations. Although years of experience are not my primary concern, I consider finding a lawyer who has a good track record in dealing with these specific matters is necessary to make sure everything is in order.

As a recent college graduate settling in Austin, Texas looking for job opportunities, I've been advised to patent an innovative product idea. I need a lawyer specializing in intellectual property law or patent law to navigate this process. It would be best if they were located nearby, so in-person meetings can happen seamlessly and without excessive travel. Since I am new to patenting, I am flexible about their years of experience, but their proficiency in patent law is something I highly value to protect my idea effectively.
